name: Pamela - Demo
description:
Something's wrong...

Where did it come from? Why is it here? What does it want?

Trapped in an environment based off my grandma's bedroom, rain is tapping the windows as you try your best to keep yourself safe as long as you can. Will you survive?

This is a demo project for a game I am currently working on. This demo contains gameplay only, no lore or story (yet). If you have any suggestions or come across any bugs, feel free to leave a comment. Thanks, and I hope you enjoy!
